name: GhostBlasters (ReadyMajor)
description:
Welcome to the GhostBlasters - where we will evict any ghost in 60 seconds or less!

The timer starts as soon as we start blastin!

Use your trusty phone to keep track of time and detect ghosts. It flashes red and green and stuff. Make sure to charge the customer for each type of ghost - your phone will tell ya what you blasted.

Return to the van when the time is up and write up the invoice. Oh, and have fun!
